words.def: an abnormal new mass of tissue that serves no purpose
A note sounded on a horn at the death of a deer.
a journey or route all the way around a particular place or area
A member of the Romani people.
(ethnic slur) offensive and derogatory name for a Black man who is abjectly servile and deferential to Whites
(baseball) a failure by a batter or runner to reach a base safely in baseball
Usually in plural orts A fragment; a scrap of leftover food; any remainder; a piece of refuse.
a state of decay usually accompanied by an offensive odor
a groove or furrow (especially one in soft earth caused by wheels)
a prominent rock or pile of rocks on a hill
the 12th letter of the Greek alphabet
the local time at the 0 meridian passing through Greenwich, England
Toward a closed, touching or engaging position.
a state in northwestern United States on the Pacific
